title: legacy_btc
author: legacy_btc
content: hello everyone, I recently met an AI dev and through talking we realized we could make a BTC price prediction AI togetherI understand crypto and what interplays with it and she can write mean AIs, a perfect combo ðŸ‘ŒWhat we lack is data. I found some sites that sell BTC price change datasets but they are obscenely expensive. They are sure affordable for big trading companies but not for me and the AI dev.Does anybody know of alternatives or open source datasets?https://data.world/datasets/bitcoin offers some limited datasets of hourly and daily price changes, we need as much "resolution" as possible(minute changes or even more precise)... the dev can write the perfect AI but if its trained on dataset with poor resolution(incomplete) it might not work...Would appreciate any help...Thanks!

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Try the chart here https://bitcoincharts.com/charts/bitstampUSD#rg5ztgSzm1g10zm2g25.There is a 'raw data' link in the bottom left of the chart. However, this info might not be what you are looking for. I haven't checked it out except in a small way.

comments.author: Vumpolo1998
comments.body: My prediction is over $100,000 by the end of 2023

comments.author: legacy_btc
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 23, 2023, 11:41:30 AMTry the chart here https://bitcoincharts.com/charts/bitstampUSD#rg5ztgSzm1g10zm2g25.There is a 'raw data' link in the bottom left of the chart. However, this info might not be what you are looking for. I haven't checked it out except in a small way.Well I be damned... this is...perfect! Thanks! Much appreciated <3

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: NO one can perfectly predict the Btc price after a huge down of BTC.

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: $40000 at the end of the year

comments.author: Armonio23
comments.body: I think there will be no change in price for another 2-3 years.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Quote from: Armonio23 on February 28, 2023, 07:49:55 PMI think there will be no change in price for another 2-3 years. The halving is in just over one year so Iâ€™m quite confident youâ€™re wrong on that. Only time will tell but I think we 100% see above $100,000 before 2026. We usually see a meteoric rise after each block reward halving. History doesnâ€™t repeat but it often rhymes.
